NTE Co-EX Test Twitch Drops Are Now Live! Watch 2 hours of NTE livestream content on Twitch and claim your reward to enter the draw pool. You'll have a chance to receive an email granting access to the Co-Ex Test! Please check the email linked to your account on the binding page.

Note: This test qualification is applicable to PC only. Receiving a test qualification is not guaranteed. Completing the Twitch Drops task and claiming the voucher only grants entry into the qualification draw pool — it does not guarantee test access.
rewards.name: NTE Co-Ex Test Access

rewards.description: 🎮 Announcing Kakele Online's Epic Twitch Drops!  Embark on a unique journey in Kakele's realm. Dive into mystical lands, conquer quests, and enjoy our exciting Twitch Drops for enhanced gaming. Unlock rewards, including teleports, herbs, potions, and materials.  🕒 Timed Rewards: Enjoy cities Teleports, Ultra potions, Gold Refiner Kits and collect Dog Cards and Trophies.  💰 Prosperity Path: Gain Copper, Tin, Silver, Iron, Gold, Life Herbs, Mana Herbs for success. Accumulate Reputation Coins.  🎈 Grand Finale: End with an exclusive Twitch Drop and Bacon Extravaganza surprise! Link accounts, watch streams, and claim rewards for an unforgettable RPG experience.  🌟 How to Join:  Link Accounts: Connect your account and Twitch in the game app. Watch Streams: Tune in during to your favorite Kakele streamer. Claim Rewards: Receive Twitch Drop notifications claim in the game app.  Influencers: To enable drops on your stream, email us!  Don't miss the chance to enrich your journey with Twitch Drops!
rewards.name: Kakele Online- February

rewards.description: Jumpstart your Deep Sky Network journey with Twitch Drops! Link your Twitch and TLG accounts at the Drops Connection URL, then watch any The Lost Glitches stream with Drops enabled to earn: Tier I (15 min) – 2,500 Data Cores, Tier II (30 min) – 7,500 Data Cores, Tier III (60 min) – 15,000 Data Cores. Track and claim in your Twitch Drops Inventory; after claiming, log into TLG to receive the items. One claim per tier per account during this campaign. See the Drops Detail page for steps and FAQ. (Progress counts across all TLG channels during the campaign.)
rewards.name: TLG Jumpstart!
